headline: GTA Online
subtitle: OPEN UP
content:
Why has Open Wheel racing taken Los Santos by storm? Is it the city’s long-standing commitment to hosting breathtaking, completely deregulated racetracks?

Or is it the perfect way to show off your incredible wealth and astonishing reflexes? Why not both?

All new Open Wheel Races and the Open Wheel Race Creator are now available. And for the mechanically minded, there’s a new heads-up display to see your vehicle’s damage and tire degradation throughout the race.
